Photography captures precious moments in life.
Professional cameras offer excellent resolution.Editorial photography ensures that every aspect of the image is carefully crafted to convey a specific message or mood.
Polarizing filters can enhance the visual appeal of an image, but they also introduce new challenges in terms of lighting and color grading.Street photography involves documenting everyday life with a sense of immediacy and intimacy, often using a handheld camera and a shallow depth of field to blur the background.
Adjusting white balance can greatly impact the overall look of an image, from warm and natural tones in daylight shots to cool and bluish tones in indoor scenes.
